```{r}

```

```{r}

```

```{r}

```

```{r}
glimpse(gapminder_unfiltered)
```

```{r}
gapminder_unfiltered%>%
  group_by(year)%>%
  filter(lifeExp==max(lifeExp))%>%
  select(year, country, lifeExp)->sumdat
sumdat
```
